definition: bug of temperate regions that infests beds, clothes, cloth furniture, and other household items, and feeds on human blood
details:
noun
- bug of temperate regions that infests beds, clothes, cloth furniture, and other household items, and feeds on human blood

= synonyms: bed bug, chinch
